bean.description: 根据订单id查询收货信息

constructor-arg.value: select sc.ID, sc.ORDER_ID as orderId, sc.NAME, sc.COUNTRY, sc.PROVINCE, sc.CITY, sc.AREA, sc.ADDRESS, sc.MOBILE, sc.TEL, sc.EMAIL, sc.POSTCODE, sc.APPOINT_TIME_QUANTUM as appointTimeQuantum , sc.APPOINT_TIME as appointTime, sc.APPOINT_TYPE as appointType, sc.VERSION from t_so_consignee as sc where sc.ORDER_ID = :orderId

bean.description: 根据订单orderIds查询收货信息

constructor-arg.value: select sc.ID, sc.ORDER_ID as orderId, sc.NAME, sc.COUNTRY, sc.PROVINCE, sc.CITY, sc.AREA, sc.ADDRESS, sc.MOBILE, sc.TEL, sc.EMAIL, sc.POSTCODE, sc.APPOINT_TIME_QUANTUM as appointTimeQuantum , sc.APPOINT_TIME as appointTime, sc.APPOINT_TYPE as appointType, sc.VERSION from t_so_consignee as sc where sc.ORDER_ID in ( #foreach( $id in $orderIds ) $id, #end -1)
